title: [SLOT UNALLOCATED]
content:
[[module CSS]]

.body-text {
    margin: 2% 13% 2% 9%;
    padding: 5px 20px 5px 20px;
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
    color: #111;
}

.text4desk {
    width: 70%;
    margin: auto;
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {

    .body-text {
        margin: 0% 4% 0% 4%;
    }

    .text4desk {
        width:100%;
    }

}


[[/module]]
[[=]]
[[div style="background: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-great-hippo/scp_trans.png) center no-repeat ; float: center; border: solid 2px #000000; padding: 1px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]] 
+ WARNING: ƟU-1875 DETECTS SIGNIFICANT DATABASE CORRUPTION TO A CERTAINTY OF 68%
----
+++ CONTACT TECHNICAL SUPPORT AT THE NEAREST OPPORTUNITY.
[[/div]]
[[/=]]
@@@@
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#f2f2c2; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[=]]
++++ NOTICE FROM THE [DATA LOST] 

Documents 4947-B-I through -VII are inaccessible. Do not attempt to access them. It's all gone.

-- [DATA LOST][[footnote]]ƟU-1875 estimates that this statement represents a database consistency error to a certainty of 96%. **Justification:** Dr. [DATA LOST] was placed in an assisted living facility on [DATA LOST].[[/footnote]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[=]]
++ **Document 4947-B-VIII:** Exploration I of SCP-4947-B.
[[/=]]
//On who cares, the date will just be lost anyway, Agent Ezekiel Jones, [DATA LOST] selected to explore SCP-4947-B119. [DATA LOST] was chosen on account of [DATA LOST].[DATA LOST] Yarkoni [DATA LOST].//

//The Foundation, as with the last seven times, did not learn anything new. [DATA LOST]//
------
[[div class="body-text"]]
//[DATA LOST]//

**Yarkoni:** The holes always degrade beforehand. If you're feeling bad, I won't ask you to risk your life here.

//[DATA LOST]//

//Agent Jones continues down [DATA LOST] hallway.//

**Jones:** Yeesh, sorry about that. You got any idea what that could mean?

**Yarkoni:** The houses are holes. How many times have I established this? 

**Jones:** You could make a hole in a hole[[footnote]]ƟU-1875 estimates that this statement represents a database consistency error to a certainty of **NaN**%. **Justification:** **[COGNITOHAZARD AUTOMATICALLY EXPUNGED]**.[[/footnote]].

//Much of the video footage is directed at the floor. The floorboards have rotten through, falling into the basement on occasion. [DATA LOST] suggesting sever fungal infection. Notably, [DATA LOST] native to Sweden.//

//The basement is covered in holes.//

**Jones:** Yankee, you got any idea what this place is?

//Agent Jones remains silent for several seconds, before continuing onward.//

**Yarkoni:** You're walking on a hole.

**Jones:** Am I? Ah hell, guess I ain't coming through the trapdoor. Time to explore?
**Yarkoni:** Sure, go ahead. Honestly, be free. I'm not your boss.

//[DATA LOST] other end of the hallway. The door opens without issue into a decrepit living room. There's a hole in the wall.//

[[>]]
**Looks wrong, doc, but I guess that's why we sent molerats[[footnote]]ƟU-1875 estimates that this statement //database cons//istency error to a certainty of **NaN**%. **Justification:** What molerats?[[/footnote]] in.:** 
JonesKeep looking, I'm sure you'll find something. They always do.
**:Yarkoni**

 //[[footnote]]ƟU-1875 this statement //database cons//istency error to an absolute of **NaN**%. **Justification:** No it didn't.[[/footnote]]Video feed cuts out.//
[[/>]]

[[=]]
**Jones**
**:**
Speaking of, you know if Foxtrot and Hotel found anything?
**Yarkoni:** Nothing new. Nothing new under the sun.

**Agent Jones:**
[[/=]]

Alright then, Yarkoni. Continuing [DATA LOST]ward[[footnote]]ƟU-1875 says this is wrong. **Justification:** He turned.[[/footnote]].//As D-947 continues west, missing patches of vegetation// You know what kind of shit I'm up against? Someone spilled whiteout on the dossier.
**Yarkoni:** They always do, don't they?

//Jones is silent for several seconds as he explores the house. It is full of holes.//

**Jones:** [DATA LOST] **Yarkoni:** Call it a cynic's intuition.

//[DATA LOST][[footnote]]ƟU-1875 hates this. **Justification:** I fixed this very close to right now.[[/footnote]]//

//Jones hurries up the starewell. There's some holes in the railing in places.//
[[=]]
//So he goes up the stairs. The stairs are nice for the rest of the house. He gets to the attic.//
[[/=]]
**Yarkoni:** It never appears on my screen. Might be that pictures have a tendency to become holes. Think you can describe it?

**Jones:** [DATA LOST][[footnote]]ƟU-1875 does not get it. **Justification:** I feel like I should know what these words mean.[[/footnote]]
**Yarkoni:** Surprise, surprise, that didn't come through.

**Description:** Jones pushes against the locked stairwell for
//several seconds. Eventually, the trapdoor breaks//
[[>]]
//AND jONES EMERGES INTO [data lost]//
//Jones: Oh god, I left them to die, I left them to die, I left them to die. I'm going to die here, aren't I?//
[[/>]]
**Yarkoni:**[[footnote]]ƟU-1875 is happy! **Justification:** Dr. Yarkoni, you're back! God, it's been **NaN NaV** **//FATAL EXCEPTION//**[[/footnote]] You know what? Screw it. I can say anything and everything I want. Nobody's going to care, cause they won't read it, and I won't get in trouble.

**Yarkoni:** Yes. You are going to die here.

**Yarkoni:** I'm sorry.

//[DATA LOST]//
[[/div]]

[[/=]]
author: UraniumEmpire
